title: Remove duplicate close button from grave detail card

requirements.text: Remove one of the duplicate close buttons (X) from the GraveDetailCard modal in the top-right corner, keeping only a single close button for dismissing the card

quotes: na wizytówce w prawym górnym rogu dubluje sie "krzyżyk" którym wyłączamy wizytówkę. Należy jeden "krzyżyk" - do wyłączania wizytówki usunąć - wystarczy jeden do wyłączenia.

acceptanceCriteria: Only one close button (X) appears in the top-right corner of the grave detail card modal
The remaining close button successfully closes the modal when clicked
No visual duplicates or overlapping close icons are visible

constraints: Do not modify the card opening functionality triggered by clicking on a grave
Preserve all other content and functionality of the GraveDetailCard component
nonGoals: Changing the position or styling of the close button
Modifying the grave detail card content or layout beyond removing the duplicate button
Altering the modal backdrop or other visual elements
